title: minerjones
author: minerjones
content: Just released by Fantagraphics comes "Red Room: Trigger Warnings #3" by Ed PiskorThere are a total of 6 covers for this issue... 2 of them had BTC on the cover! The comic continues the story of the 10,000BTC paid by Lazlo for his pizzas back in 2010"Hop on a luxury yacht to the far reaches of the globe in this most unusual Red Room saga yet. Welcome to the island of Pitcairn, home to a native civilization that has been sacrificing their people to the gods for generations in hopes for a good crop season â€” until bitcoin pirates discover the island and hatch their own plans. The smash hit splatterpunk series continues, from the creator of X-Men: Grand Design and Hip Hop Family Tree, and co-host of the YouTube comics sensation, Cartoonist Kayfabe"Can find more information here: https://www.fantagraphics.com/collections/ed-piskor/products/red-room-trigger-warnings-3And should be able to find for sale from ebay, Amazon, and most any online comic retailer

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: are you doing a bulk order? if so, would like a copy of each shown above

comments.author: 2stout
comments.body: Quote from: minerjones on May 23, 2022, 01:07:20 PMQuote from: Bullion-n-BTC on May 23, 2022, 11:59:32 AM1 of eaYou got it.1x of each left.Can order another batch if people are interestedI'll take the 1x of each left.

comments.author: minerjones
comments.body: Orders finally came in.I have 3x of each cover availableCopies are $5 eachI realize now, that if you are a US customer, you can get them cheaper directly from the company.Comes out to just under $12 shipped for the 2x books from them.So may be better for any international customers to grab these
